name: CLARITY_HVR_ANSWER
description: This table stores the answer record (HQA) IDs that are associated with the verification records.

columns.name: VERIFY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the verification record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column holds the line number corresponding to the line of the answer. Each answer associated with the verification record will be stored on a separate line.

columns.name: VERIFY_ANS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the verification answer record.
